__e: The only thing he did wrong was marry you.
His only mistake, if any, was trusting me and expecting me to do the right thing.
Your only fault was to love me, to have given me the desire to live for something again.
His only mistake, if any, was trusting me and expecting me to do the right thing.
Your only fault was to love me, to have given me the desire to live for something again.
All he did was make one mistake.
I mean, go if you want, but you're my one friend here.
He's my only friend and you wanna take him away from me.
Look, I don't know how in the hell this just happened, but in this exact moment... you're my only friend.
My only desire is to stay here with you.
My only wish is that one day, when you're off traveling space and time, you'll realize what I have, and understand why I'm doing what I'm doing.
All I ever wanted was for you to be happy.
No, our only way forward is to get Mary settled as soon as possible.
Like you want me to tell you that-- That I got separated from the crew, that I got lost in the jungle, I was sick, suicide was my only way out, because that's what makes sense, right?
Truth is your only play right now, because you fucked up letting yourself be alone in this room with me.
My only comfort is that, uh, she still has you.
The only thing you can take solace in is a girl like her would probably never be interested in you.
My only consolation is that your father won't be there.
- Sign here. He was my only boy, and I love him so much.
Well, since you are Vorobyaninov's only son... I'll see what I can do.
I mean, I know I'm her only son, and I'm all she's got left in this world, so that responsibility falls on me, and it's a lot.
